name: Fidelity National Financial, Inc.
description: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. (FNF) is a leading provider of title insurance, technology, and transaction services to the real estate and mortgage industries. Founded in 1847, FNF has grown to become one of the largest title insurance companies in the United States, serving a diverse range of clients including homebuyers, real estate agents, and lenders. With a commitment to innovation and customer service, FNF offers a comprehensive suite of title and settlement services that streamline real estate transactions. The company operates through multiple segments, including Title Insurance and Services, and Corporate and Other, providing a variety of solutions such as title insurance policies, escrow services, and data and analytics. FNF is also a significant player in the financial technology sector, leveraging advanced technology to enhance its service offerings. The company's mission is to provide a seamless and efficient experience for its clients, while maintaining the highest standards of integrity and professionalism in every transaction. With a strong national presence and a commitment to community engagement, FNF aims to make a lasting impact in the real estate industry.

key_executives.name: Jeremy B. H. R. D. H. P. S. T. S.

faq.question: What does Fidelity National Financial do?
faq.answer: FNF provides title insurance, technology, and transaction services to the real estate and mortgage industries.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial?
faq.answer: Mike Nolan is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Fidelity National Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What are FNF's main services?
faq.answer: FNF's main services include title insurance, closing services, and data analytics.

faq.question: When was Fidelity National Financial founded?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial was founded in 1847.
